articles.title: The 'Blue Marble': One of Earth's most iconic images, 50 years on - CNN
articles.description: Taken 50 years ago on Wednesday, the "Blue Marble" has become one of the world's most widely reproduced photographs — and an icon of the environmental movement.
articles.content:
artsPublished 7th December 2022
In Snap, we look at the power of a single photograph, chronicling stories about how both modern and historical images have been made.
